name: Microservices
description: We love microservices - architecture approach, building highly alligned & loosly coupled services.

name: Inner Source
description: We treat internal teams as code contributors; avoid release block during cross team development.

name: Agile
description: Flexible and adaptive software development aproach. We used it through all of our Product Teams and development cycle.

name: Event-Driven Architecture
description: We use events to connect different parts of platform independently, thus we achieve loosly coupled system.

name: KISS
description: Design principle we use during any decision making.

name: Fail Fast
description: We experiment a lot. So we are ready for fails but well prepared fails.

name: GIST
description: Goals, Ideas, Steps, Tasks - product development and hypotheses verification planning system

name: CI/CD
description: We use CI/CD to achieve stable incremental changes.

name: Code Generation
description: We generate code instead of coupling services via single shared components; avoid external dependencies.

name: Empowered Product Teams
description: We are customer oriented, think of outcome over the output, empowered to solve hard problems, inspired with ideas and techniques to discover solutions that work.

name: Data-Driven Product Management
description: We build product increments driven by experiments and data analysis.

name: Domain-Driven Design
description: We use this as Monoliths decomposition approach and layered applications architecture approach.

name: Evolutionary Architecture
description: We us flexible architecture approach which evolves over the time that prevents main system characteristics degradation over the time.

name: Git flow & Jira flow
description: We use it as main flow for software lifecycle.

name: Clean Architecture
description: We use this architecture approach to implement core functionality, user interface, infrastructure and organizing the project so that it's easy to understand and easy to change as the project grows.

name: SSR
description: We generate client apps on server to improve SEO and performance.

name: Specification first
description: Defining a service API separately from its code using the standard specification

name: BEM block
description: Styles and templates structrure which helps us to make less mess in our code

name: Design system
description: We use figma and code generation to sync icons and colors between iOS, Android and designers

name: UI tests
description: We're starting to automate our testing scenarios

name: CatBoost
description: Assessing as an alternative to the LightGBM

name: XGBoost
description: Assessing as an alternative to the LightGBM

name: Hashicorp Vault
description: Sensitive data storage for k8s services

name: Codeception
description: Base for functional and unit tests

name: jQuery
description: Legacy in old system web components</p

name: Ansible
description: Control and automated deployment of configurations

name: Gatling
description: Load testing tool for web applications

name: Wiremock
description: Mock service for dependency isolation while running tests

name: Node.js 12.14.1
description: Using for all web projects + ssr runtime

name: Redis
description: Starage for most of cached data

name: NewRelic
description: Services status analysis and optimization based on metrics

description: Legacy in old system web components
